explains: adj. 误导的，引入歧途的
v. 误导，将……引入歧途（mislead 的现在分词形式）

sentences.cn: 这些统计资料会引起误解。

sentences.en: The ambassador called the report deceitful and misleading.
sentences.cn: 大使称该报导是不实的和误导的。

sentences.en: The instructions were not just confusing, they were positively misleading.
sentences.cn: 这些指示不单令人迷惑，而且肯定会误导人。
